column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=People need to stand up and speak out .
#Text=If Anonymous can do that legally and you 've shown me you can , then I will happily support that .
#Text=I 've seen your response to their protest on YouTube .
#Text=You almost seemed proud that a younger generation had " taken up the torch " .
#Text=People have been attempting to get Scientology to reform for close to 60 years .
#Text=They have resisted all change .
#Text=When I reached out to Anonymous , I thought I may well get attacked myself but I saw immediate reform in the group .
#Text=Scientology could learn a lot from Anonymous .
#Text=The biggest protest in the past was maybe 50 - 60 people .
#Text=Anonymous got thousands of people out everywhere around the globe and did so peacefully .
#Text=I am proud of them for that .
#Text=We 've laid the groundwork for years .
#Text=Now hopefully , some of Anonymous will continue to learn more and to speak out .
#Text=There will be attrition but so far there seems to be an eagerness to make a real positive impact .
#Text=What happened to Bob Minton ?
#Text=He is alleged to be in favor of Scientology now .
#Text=Did they give him an ' incentive ' to stop his protests of the Church ?
#Text=In a video of yours , posted on YouTube ( Scientology : Clearwater Trip - Day 3 - Pt 2 ) , Minton says that the Church attempted to " pay him money " several times .
#Text=Did they finally succeed ?
#Text=Or was he blackmailed into shutting up ?
#Text=I wrote about Bob on my blog last week .
#Text=He is my friend and I was there through most of his struggle .
#Text=Scientology launched a global assault on Bob which we came to describe as having the Terminator coming after you .
#Text=Rather than type it all out again , check out the blog .
#Text=[ xenutv.wordpress.com/about-bob-minton-and-the-lmt ]
#Text=How many members of Scientology do you estimate are within the organization ?
#Text=Far fewer than Scientology estimates .
#Text=They now say ten million but I think they are counting me for coming in and playing with the e-meter .
#Text=The best source would be the census reports which put the number pretty low .
#Text=More people claimed to be Jedi Knights than Scientologists in the UK for example .
#Text=What is your opinion on Free Zone Scientologists ?
#Text=I consider them friends .
#Text=I support their wish to follow Hubbard 's technique .
#Text=They do so without the criminal aspects of Scientology itself .
#Text=People can knock themselves [ out ]
#Text=auditing as far as I 'm concerned .
#Text=I 'm worried about the fraud and abuse .
#Text=I believe Hubbard was a conman and we have the documents to prove it .
#Text=If the freezoners do n't care , I ca n't stop them .
#Text=They are n't emptying people [ of their ] accounts and breaking up families .
